title: reCAPTCHA
summary: reCAPTCHA is a CAPTCHA system that enables web hosts to distinguish between human and automated access to websites. The original version asked users to decipher hard to read text or match images. Version 2 also asked users to decipher text or match images if the analysis of cookies and canvas rendering suggested the page was being downloaded automatically.[1] Since version 3, reCAPTCHA will never interrupt users and is intended to run automatically when users load pages or click buttons.[2] reCAPTCHA is owned by Google.
